# Problem 1

Here's a **code chunk** that samples from a _uniform[0, 5] distribution_:

```{R uniform_distribution}
library(tidyverse)
set.seed(1234)

size10_df <- tibble(
  unif_sample <- runif(10, 0, 5),
  log_vec_gr2 <- c("unif_sample" > 2)
)
```
